title: Catholic ornaments
content:
This is not exactly type related, but perhaps someone can point me in the right direction anyhow. I’m trying to find examples of typical Catholic ornamental art, first and foremost border elements and standalone ornaments. This is for a magazine piece on a Catholic publishing house. Please don’t spend any time digging up stuff, but do drop a line if you know any good resources.

Thanks,

– Frode
author: frode frank

comments.content: not sure if they are denominational but this site has some ornaments available to download: [http://www.briarpress.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131132311/http:/www.briarpress.org/)
